THANK YOU!â­â­â­â­â­â­â­â­â­â­ Kishore - September 29, 2012 - Version 1.6Very niceThis application clear unwanted temporary files and increase internal memory.â­â­â­â­â­DEFRAG+ IS NOT A FLASH DEFRAGMENTERâ Option to erase internet search historyâ Cleans memory caches that slow your phone and tabletâ Deletes corrupted files which greatly boosts performanceâ Report Section detailing Used Memory / Free Memory / Repaired Files and Memory Usage PIE Chartâ Streamlined design for ease of use (KISS Principle) for your android mobile & tabletâ Select either Phone Memory or SD Card from your list and click Defrag, itâs that easyâ Beautiful user friendly interface designâ Auto landscape application lock now prevents corrupted files or an interrupted DefragDEFRAG+ Extra Features Include:- Increased process speed- Increased battery optimization- Reduces start up times- No Advertisements during ReportDefrag+ works by moving, removing and repairing unwanted cache files, speeding up your Androids response and load times, freeing up your Memory and RAM by killing unwanted tasks and optionally clearing all browser history.For technical problems or issues please email us at any time. reviews.title: Impressed
reviews.comment: I already see a difference in my phones processing speed. Less freezing, fast screen switching, more responsive. Five stars if you can set up an auto-run or weekly scheduled maintenance feature.
reviews.author: Samantha S

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Nexus i9250
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work. Don\'t waste your money.

reviews.title: Not very good
reviews.comment: Evey time i use this the image of the defrag layout looks the same. I swear its just a animation that goes through the motions of defrag. I am not that convinced its doing anything. No result afterwards

reviews.title: ma95501
reviews.comment: Sam Sung Galaxy S III Excellent! Well worth the money and does the job. Cleared up several problems and sped up my browser.

reviews.title: Defrag
reviews.comment: Works really good. It does what it claims.  Why wouldn\'t you treat your smartphone like your cumputer on your desks? We all use it like  one. Take care of your smartphone! This app works well. JMB
reviews.author: JeanMarieBassett Jmbassett

reviews.title: RUBBISH
reviews.comment: There are TWO defrag panes (\'phone\' & \'SD\'). The Galaxy Note has THREE storages (it also has \'external SD\'- mine being 64GB, by FAR the largest storage, and apparently not defraggable by this app). Also, the fragged files graphic returning to show same fragmentation status if the app is relaunched following its use indicates this app does **ck all!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This application works quite well
reviews.comment: I thought it was a snake oil scam and ready to hit the refund button but glad I didn\'t!   This is a miracle for non root users well worth it\'s weight in gold,  typing is quicker with my swift keyboard and telephone keypad. I\'d say just an overall quicker response load up times from various applications.  I verified it with system manager my card has been compressed 1-2%.  Would be nice to have a schedule setup so it can be done at preset times will wait for developer to update.  EVO 3D.
reviews.author: T Perkins

reviews.title: Nice!!
reviews.comment: I have to say, I was expecting more after I paid a few $$ for it.  I kinda find it funny that you don\'t have to select a drrive, you can just tap defragged. Kudos to you guys on the graphics however!!  Worth a couple bucks just to watch the graphics, eve when you close the \"Defrag\342\200\235 program & instantly re-open it just to see that the graphics are showing Red dots as if you\'ve NEVER defaged in the first place! And don\'t forget to thank the programmers that made this all possible.

reviews.title: NEED TO IMPROVE
reviews.comment: Of course have something positive, but not efficient as it could be. I rate 4 stars because I believe on it. Try to add some feature such AutoDefrag on start,  and report more detailled on what was repaired. GUI also a bit weak. I am really waiting for more than that but I am still not disapointed by the result.
